events.message: I am filing a claim for the car accident that occurred last night involving severe front-end damage.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident due to the involvement of a vehicle collision.
An insurance agent has been assigned to assist with the claim and guide you through the process.
Your auto accident claim has been officially acknowledged by the insurance company.
Please submit the police report and photos of the vehicle damage to proceed with the claim assessment.
All requested documents including the police report and pictures of the car damage have been uploaded.
The investigation into the cause and extent of the vehicle collision damage has officially begun.
The investigation team has completed their review and confirmed the details of the auto accident claim.
A settlement proposal based on the assessed damages and liability has been sent for your consideration.
We have received your feedback regarding the proposed settlement and understand your concerns fully.
Your auto accident claim has been approved after reviewing all submitted documents and investigation results.
The approved payment for your car accident claim has been processed and sent to your account.
Your claim has been closed successfully following the payment and final settlement agreement.
